description:
1997’s Con Air has a stacked cast, quotable lines, action galore, and a fantastic performance by Nicolas Cage. The film, directed by Simon West, came out during the 90s when studios knew what filmgoers wanted in a summer blockbuster. Many people behind and in front of the camera have gone on to successful careers in [...]

The post Exclusive: ‘Con Air’ Director Simon West Wants To Make ‘Con Air 2’ With Nicolas Cage appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Exclusive: ‘Con Air’ Director Simon West Wants To Make ‘Con Air 2’ With Nicolas Cage

description:
As with previous Avengers movies, the upcoming installments Avengers: Doomsday and Avengers: Secret Wars are expected to reunite numerous fan-favorite characters. Of course, it’d be impossible to get everyone onboard with how congested the casts tend to be, and now we know one beloved MCU character has been removed from appearing in Avengers: Doomsday. Interestingly, [...]

The post Beloved Marvel MCU Character Removed From ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Beloved Marvel MCU Character Removed From ‘Avengers: Doomsday’
